Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Spearhead
Description: Spearhead with a 3,2 cm long tang and a constant width of 1,5 cm. The thickness of the tang and the head are identical, both 0,5 cm. There are coloured veins in the stone on both the head and the tang. The tip is slightly chipped. The junction of the head and the tang is slightly  asymmetrical.
